actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to establish an Agency of Economic and Natural Resources Planning in the executive branch of the Federal Government.

summary.text: Establishes within the Executive Branch the Agency for Economic and Natural Resources Planning to report annually to the President and Congress and each instrumentality of the Executive Branch on the status and long-range outlook for economic and natural resources and goals for better utilization of resources. Transfers to the Agency from the Departments of Agriculture, Interior, Commerce and each other Executive agency all functions and duties of long-range planning of our natural resources.

titles.title: A bill to establish an Agency of Economic and Natural Resources Planning in the executive branch of the Federal Government.
